WaniKani_Reading_Info: It's just you and your car now, living the widow life, driving on into the sunset and forgetting your past.

The inscriptions of the Warring States Period are decorated with pens from both sides of the " page ".

Jin Wen said that the woman lost her husband, and Mao Gongding: "Widow (insult) widow", "Mencius. "Liang Hui Wang": "Old without a wife is a widow, and old without a husband is a widow." It also means less, and the Mi's pot: "There is no shortage of many", Guo Moruo: "It seems that the pot has a certain capacity, and there is no such thing as too few. County officials, or the amount of time at that time, are just a fight." It is also used as a self-proclaimed. After the Spring and Autumn Period, the princes may call themselves "widow people."

"Shuowen": "Widows are few. From Liu Cong. To award, and to divide the gift, so it is less." Duan Yucai's note: "Everything in the extension is easy and alone is a widow."

humanum_full_description:
西周金文從「宀」從「頁」，「宀」象房屋，象一人在屋內獨處(季旭昇)，有單獨、孤獨之意，本義是獨居無伴，引申為少。戰國金文從「頁」兩側加飾筆。

　　金文表示女子喪夫，毛公鼎：「迺敄(侮)鰥寡」，《孟子．梁惠王上》：「老而無妻曰鰥，老而無夫曰寡。」又表示少，杕氏壺：「多寡不訏」，郭沫若：「似言壺之容量有一定，無多寡之縣差，或者于當時之量，恰受一斗也。」又用作自稱，春秋以後王侯或自稱「寡人」，中山王鼎：「敬順天德，以左右寡人。」又用作人名。

　　《說文》：「寡，少也。从宀从頒。頒，分賦也，故爲少。」段玉裁注：「引伸之凡倮然、單獨皆曰寡。」

淡而无味：寡味。清汤寡水。

寡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guǎ］
［《廣韻》古瓦切，上馬，見。］
(1)少。
(2)人少。
(3)指孤陋寡闻的人。
(4)使减少。
(5)缺少；没有。
(6)以为软弱；弱小。
(7)犹孤立。
(8)孤独；孤单。
(9)指丧失配偶。
(10)后渐以专指妇人丧夫。
(11)古代王侯的谦称。《老子》：“故貴以賤爲本，高以下爲基。是以侯王自謂孤、寡、不穀。”《吕氏春秋·士容》：“南面稱寡，而不以侈大。”高诱注：“孤、寡，謙稱也。”北齐颜之推《颜氏家训·风操》：“昔者，王侯自稱孤、寡、不穀，自兹以降，雖孔子聖師，與門人言皆稱名也。”一说寡为至尊之意，并非谦词。

寡字的源字形

寡字的起名意思

意指少。寡还是古代君主的自称。此外，还指死了丈夫，如寡妇。

Radicals: 宀, 頁, 一, 刀  (roof, geoduck, ground, sword)
Meaning Mnemonic
Under your own roof, a geoduck jumps out of the ground with a sword and stabs your husband/wife/marriage partner to death. Now you're a widow.
Imagine the geoduck laughing and screaming, "Now you're a widow! Now you're a widow!" flailing the sword around. It's awful.
Reading Mnemonic
You may be a widow, but that doesn't make you weak. You run outside, jump into your car (か), and run your entire house and the geoduck over.
It's just you and your car now, living the widow life, driving on into the sunset and forgetting your past.
